name: Cushioning Shield
text: You let your shield absorb some of the damage from a fall.
prerequisites: Shield Focus, base attack bonus +6 or fighter level 4th.
benefit: When you fall 10 or more feet, you can direct half of the falling damage you would take to your shield. This damage ignores the shield’s hardness.
staminaText: You can spend 5 stamina points to utilize your shield’s hardness when directing falling damage to it. (See page 18.)
text_zh: 使用盾牌吸收坠落时的部分伤害。
benefit_zh: 当你坠落10尺或以上时，将一半的坠落伤害转嫁给你的盾牌。该伤害无视盾牌硬度。
staminaText_zh: 你可以消耗5点耐力来在引导坠落伤害至盾牌时将盾牌的硬度应用上去。
